Sit or lie comfortably.
close your eyes.
Make no effort to control the breath; simply breathe naturally. Eventually,Focus your attention on the breath and on how the body moves with each inhalation and exhalation..
Notice the movement of your body as you breathe. Observe your chest, shoulders, rib cage, and belly.
Maintain this meditation practice for two to three minutes then try it for longer periods.

Meditation has many advantages.It reduces stress. Stress reduction is one of the most common reasons people try meditation.
It controls anxiety.
It promotes emotional health.
It Enhances self-awareness.
Meditation helps in lengthening attention span.
It may reduce age-related memory loss.
It can generate kindness.
It may help fight addictions.

string.name: yogadescription1
string.br: The art of practicing yoga helps in controlling our mind, body and soul. It brings together physical and mental disciplines to achieve a peaceful body and mind; it helps manage stress and anxiety and keeps you relaxing.Some of the basic postures in yoga are as follows
SIRSASANA – HEADSTAND. An āsana in which you balance on your elbows, arms and head.
SARVANGASANA – SHOULDERSTAND. An inverted pose, with the body resting on the shoulders.

string.name: sleepdescription1
string.br: If you do not fall asleep within about 20 minutes, leave your bedroom and do something relaxing. Do not go to bed hungry or stuffed. Create a room that is ideal for sleeping. Often, this means cool, dark and quiet.
Long daytime naps can interfere with nighttime sleep. Regular physical activity can promote better sleep. Try to resolve your worries or concerns before bedtime.

Sleeping Can Increase Productivity. Lack of Sleep Can Be Dangerous. Sleep Can Increase Exercise Performance. Sleep Improves Memory.

string.name: nutritiondescription1
string.br: Eat a variety of vegetables, especially dark green, red, and orange vegetables (3 or more servings a day). Eat a variety of fruits (2 or more servings a day).
Eat whole-grain, high-fiber breads and cereals (3 to 6 servings a day). Drink fat-free or low-fat milk and eat low-fat dairy products.
